name: Decks Of Power
description:
Welcome to the greatest battle tournament ever held.



Decks of power is an action rougelite deck-building game with a twist. Players are not allowed to discard unwanted cards and must figure out strategic opportunities to use them against the enemy. Enemies level up each time you defeat them in battle and are stronger when you encounter them again.
Craft a unique deck, defeat all your opponents in combat and become a top general.





FEATURES

Unique Deck Building : Gain access to hundreds of cards to add to your deck. Pick your cards wisely.

Constantly Evolving Characters : Enemies level up each time you defeat them in battle and are stronger when you encounter them again.

Strategic Gameplay : Players are not allowed to discard unwanted cards and must figure out strategic opportunities to use them against the enemy.

Highly Replayable : The enemy upgrade system allows players to replay the game with a different experience each time.

Face powerful bosses in tactical combat
